title: SET_WAVE_QUAD_DIRECTION
content:
0xFC9341A3// SetWaveQuadDirection
BOOL SET_WAVE_QUAD_DIRECTION(int waveQuad, float directionX, float directionY);Parameters:waveQuad: The wave quad indexdirectionX: The minX coordinatedirectionY: The minY coordinateReturns: Returns true on success.directionX/Y should be constrained between -1.0 and 1.0
A positive value will create the wave starting at min and rolling towards max
A negative value will create the wave starting at max and rolling towards min
Applying both values allows you to make diagonal wavesExamples:Lualocal success = SetWaveQuadDirection(0, 0.3, 0.1)
codeBlocks:
// SetWaveQuadDirection
BOOL SET_WAVE_QUAD_DIRECTION(int waveQuad, float directionX, float directionY);
